resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103152</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103152</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205691</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Smithsonian Jazz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Smithsonian Jazz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jazz Smithsonien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jazz Smithsonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jazz Smithsonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σμιθσονιτική τζαζ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jazz Smithsonian</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">celebrates Jazz Appreciation Month, April, by offering sound clips, information about jazz events, a directory of jazz societies (by state and country), links to other jazz websites, and four online classes featuring Duke Ellington, Ella Fitzgerald, Louis Armstrong, and Benny Carter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">feiert Jazz-Anerkennung Monat, April, indem den 
Antrag der stichhaltigen Clips, der Informationen über Jazzfälle, 
des Verzeichnisses der Jazzgesellschaften (durch Zustand und Land), 
der Links anderen Jazzweb site und vier Onlinekategorien, die Herzog 
Ellington, Ella Fitzgerald, Louis Armstrong und Benny Carter 
kennzeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">célèbre le mois d'appréciation de jazz, avril, 
en offrant les clips sains, les informations sur des événements de 
jazz, un répertoire des sociétés de jazz (par l'état et le pays), 
des liens à d'autres sites Web de jazz, et quatre classes en ligne 
comportant le duc Ellington, Ella Fitzgerald, Louis Armstrong, et 
benny Charretier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comemora o mês da apreciação do jazz, abril, 
oferecendo grampos sadios, informação sobre eventos do jazz, um 
diretório de sociedades do jazz (pelo estado e pelo país), as 
ligações a outros Web site do jazz, e quatro classes em linha que 
caracterizam o duque Ellington, Ella Fitzgerald, Louis Armstrong, e 
benny Carter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">celebra il mese di apprezzamento di jazz, aprile, 
offrendo le clip sane, le informazioni sugli eventi di jazz, un indice
delle società di jazz (da dichiari e paese), i collegamenti 
ad altri Web site di jazz e quattro codici categoria in linea che 
caratterizzano il duca Ellington, Ella Fitzgerald, Louis Armstrong ed 
il benny Carter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γιορτάζει το μήνα εκτίμησης τζαζ, Απρίλιος, με την 
προσφορά των υγιών συνδετήρων, πληροφορίες για τα γεγονότα τζαζ, 
ένας κατάλογος αρχείων των κοινωνιών τζαζ (από το κράτος και τη 
χώρα), συνδέσεων με άλλους ιστοχώρους τζαζ, και τεσσάρων σε 
απευθείας σύνδεση κλάσεων που χαρακτηρίζουν το δούκα 
Ellington, Ella Fitzgerald, Louis Armstrong, και 
Benny Carter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">celebra el mes del aprecio del jazz, abril, 
ofreciendo los clips de los sonidos, la información sobre 
acontecimientos del jazz, un directorio de las sociedades del jazz 
(por el estado y el país), conexiones a otros Web site del jazz, y 
cuatro clases en línea que ofrecen a duque Ellington, Ella 
Fitzgerald, Louis Armstrong, y benny Carretero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205691</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103152</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/smithsonian-jazz</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
